Mintit

Scroll Down

Mintit

Mintit

A Hassle-Free and Reliable Platform for Recycling Secondhand ICT Devices

MINTIT has created a recycling ecosystem for ICT devices with Korea’s first AI-based unmanned used phone kiosk, MINTIT ATM. This platform allows users to easily and conveniently trade in used phones from virtually anywhere.

Furthermore, MINTIT enhances trust and security in secondhand phone transactions by integrating a system certified by international quality standards, which ensures the complete deletion of personal information and data from used phones.

In addition to facilitating secondhand phone trading, MINTIT is committed to leading in ESG management. Our resource recycling campaigns, such as environmental clean-ups at Yeouido Saetgang Park and support for ICT-marginalized communities, empower individuals to save resources and contribute to environmental protection in their daily lives.

Performance Highlights

Core
Competitiveness
AI-based Diagnosis and Price Appraisal

Utilizing AI machine learning-based technology for phone exterior evaluation, our ATM provides real-time appraisal results, improving transparency in the secondhand phone market.

Non-Face-to-Face ATM

With over 6,600 locations nationwide, our non-face-to-face ATM system simplifies the secondhand phone trading process, making it more convenient for users.

Complete Data Deletion

MINTIT’s proprietary data deletion app, certified by the international certification ADISA, along with Korea’s first patented data deletion technology, ensures the complete removal of personal information, preventing data leakage.

사회적 가치
고객과 함께 사회적 가치를 만들어갑니다.

민팃을 통해 판매한 중고폰은 재활용을 통해 폐기물을 감축하는 것은 물론 새로운 스마트폰 생산과정에서 발생하는 온실가스 배출을 줄여 자원을 절약하고 환경을 보호하는데 기여합니다.

또한 ‘기부하기’를 통해 더 나은 사회를 만드는데 기여하고 있습니다. 중고폰 평가 금액을 기부할 경우 IT 취약계층의 아동들의 학습에 필요한 전자기기, 교재, 교육비 등을 지원해왔습니다. 앞으로도 중고폰 사업을 통한 사회적 가치 창출에 힘쓸 계획입니다.

지난 2021년에는 여의샛강공원에 4천 그루의 묘목을 심고, 매년 식목일마다 환경정화 활동을 진행하며 탄소중립에 가까워지기 위해 노력하고 있습니다.
